import {useState} from "react"; export function BookAdd() { const book = useState({ bookName: "" }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { if (book.bookName === "") { alert("입력값을 확인해주세요!"); } else { console.log(book.bookName) } } const optionValue = ["COMPUTER", "SCIENCE", "ECONOMY", "COMIC", "SPORTS"] return (
); }
